channel.title: Axoloti v1.0.12-2 fails to start Windows 7 can't fnd api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
channel.description:
New User here. Just received my Axoloti today.
64 bit Windows 7 machine, installed the hardware without issue. Apparently installed patcher 1.0.12-2 also without issue. Ran Axoloti.exe and immediately received an error dialog box stating that "api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll is missing. Try reinstalling the application".
Upon inspecting the C:\Program Files (x86) folder, the install looks good. and the api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll appears in the C:\Program Files (x86)\Axoloti\runtime\bin folder. Tried rebooting the machine, resinstalling, starting Axoloti with and without hardware running, ran as administroator... no avail. Any ideas?
I installed v1.0.12 and it works. So that suggests there's something in the the v.0.12-2 versions that's borked for a Windows 7 X64 installation. I guess since 1.0.12 is running, I'm not dead in the water, but sure like to be running the latest S/W.

item.title: Axoloti v1.0.12-2 fails to start Windows 7 can't fnd api-ms-win-crt-runtime-l1-1-0.dll
item.dc:creator: @BrianA
item.description:
@BrianA wrote:

Help with installation (Windows)

Sorry to resurrect this old thread but also trying to install on a Windows 7 (SP1) machine, and am getting this error message when I try and start the Axoloti software: [image] I can confirm that runtime is saved in the correct place as directed above.

Read full topic
